metadata.Title: CVE-2018-15869 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
An Amazon Web Services (AWS) developer who does not specify the --ownersflag when describing images via AWS CLI, and therefore not properlyvalidating source software per AWS recommended security best practices, mayunintentionally load an undesired and potentially malicious Amazon MachineImage (AMI) from the uncurated public community AMI catalog.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-15869` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

packer - 1.6.6+ds1-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: packer package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.6+ds1-4').
